data.text: “But now, you people of Jerusalem, gather your troops together,
But you people of [APO] Bethlehem in Ephrathah district need to know that
But now you people of Israel will be conquered by your enemies;
And that man who will be ruling there in Jerusalem will stand and lead his people well,
And he will cause things to go well for his people.
With their swords our army will defeat the army of Assyria, whose capital was founded by Nimrod long ago.
The ◄descendants of Jacob/Israelis► who survive will be a blessing to the people of other nations,
In the midst of their enemies in many people-groups [DOU],
You Israelis will defeat [MTY] all your enemies
I will tear down your city walls
I will get rid of all those among you who practice magic
I will destroy all your idols and sacred stone pillars,
I will get rid of your poles that represent the goddess Asherah,
And because I will be very angry,
